content.rendered:
Volunteer in your country

You don’t need to travel across the world to help Ukraine fight against evil. Whether you’re based in America, Australia, or elsewhere, there are opportunities to support both Ukrainian refugees and asylum seekers, as well as Ukrainian Armed Forces.

We have compiled a list of Facebook groups as well as official government organizations that contain valuable information about current volunteer opportunities to help Ukraine while abroad.

Choose your country to find volunteer opportunities near you:

 

  • Australia
  • Austria
  • Canada
  • Czech
  • Estonia
  • Findland
  • France
  • Germany
  • Hungary
  • Italy
  • India
  • Japan
  • Lithuania
  • Latvia
  • Netherlands
  • Norway
  • Poland
  • Singapore
  • South Korea
  • Sweden
  • Ukraine
  • USA

Australia

Official organizations

Australian Federation of Ukrainian Organisations
United Resource For Ukrainians in Australia

Facebook groups

Ukrainians in Australia
Ukrainians in Adelaide
Ukrainians in Sydney
Ukrainians in Perth
Ukrainians in Melbourne - Help and Support
Ukrainians in Melbourne (Social Page)

Austria

Official organizations

Caritas Wir helfen
Diakonie Österreich
Füreinand - eine Initiative von Caritas, Krone und kronehit

Facebook groups

Ukrainische Jugend in Österreich

Donate to local volunteer organizations 

SOS KINDERDORF
World Vision
Apotheker ohne Grenzen Österreich
Arbeiter-Samariter-Bund Austria
CARE
Hilfswerk International

UK

Official organizations

Homes for Ukraine (government initiative)
British-Ukrainian Aid

Facebook groups

Ukrainians in Great Britain
Ukrainians in England
Hosts for Ukrainians in South East England
Helping Ukrainians in Norfolk
Rooms for Ukrainians North West England

Donate to local volunteer organizations 

UNICEF
Save the Children Fund
International Rescue Committee

USA

Official organizations

The U.S.-Ukraine Foundation
International Medical Corps

Facebook groups

Ukrainian Community of Atlanta
Ukrainians in New York
Ukrainians in Seattle
Ukrainians in Oregon

Donate to local volunteer organizations 

Global Giving
Razom for Ukraine
Doctors Without Borders
